meal.name: The American
meal.description: two eggs as you like / toasted bread / smoked ham / crispy bacon / mini sausages / juice or coffee

meal.name: The English
meal.description: two eggs as you like / english muffins / mini sausages / grilled tomatoes / fried mushrooms / toasted bread with butter / baked beans / juice, tea or coffee

meal.name: The European
meal.description: gouda and cheddar cheese / croisants / cereal / cold cut ham and turkey / waffles / fruit bowl / juice, tea or coffee

meal.name: The Brazilian
meal.description: cheese buns / cereal / papayas and pineapples / fruit juice / tea, coffee or hot chocolate

meal.name: The Mexican
meal.description: large fruit bowl / organic flavorless yoghurt / variety of nuts / eggs with vegetables / chilaquiles / baked beans / guacamole / sweet bread / coffee or chocolate milk

meal.name: Light morning
meal.description: large variety of the seasonal fruits / non-fat yoghurt / nuts / juice, tea or coffee
